prodNameC: 貝克曼庫爾特 賽特斯 / 庫爾特 克隆 MsIgG1-RD1/ MsIgG2a-FITC
prodNameE: Beckman Coulter Cyto-Stat / Coulter Clone MsIgG1-RD1/ MsIgG2a-FITC
ingredientsDesc: CLONE: 2T8-2F5. 7T4-1F5 (MsIgG2a) from BALB/c mice. 2T8-2F5. (MsIgG1) from BALB/c mice.Ig CHAIN: IgG2a (MsIgG2a), IgG1 (MsIgG1)SOURCE: Conditioned mediaPURIFICATION: Affinity chromatographyCONJUGATION: MsIgG2a-FITC MsIgG1-RD1MOLAR RATIO: FITC/protein 3-10 RD1/protein 0.5-1.5FLUORESCENCE: FITC (GREEN) Excites at 468-509 nm                              Emits at 504-541 nmRD1 (Orange) Excites at 486-580 nmEmits at 568-590 nmThe concentration of nonantibody reagents is 0.2% BSA, 0.01 M potassium phosphate, 0.15 M NaCl, 0.1% NaN3
applicantName: 美商貝克曼庫爾特有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區敦化南路二段216號8樓
efficacy: IgG2a(以FITC標定)和IgG1(以RD1標定)的CYTO-STAT/COULTER CLONE單株抗體進行細胞表面染色的步驟中，可以用此一同型對照抗體作為品管試劑，以監測抗體與細胞非專一性結合的程度。
